OBJECTIVE 
I am a passionate Software Developer and Data Analyst with good knowledge of DSA, Programming, and Data 
Analysis. I can solve real life problems, work with databases, and create reports using Python, SQL, Power BI, 
and Tableau. I enjoy solving Problems and helping make better decisions using data. 
 
EdUCATION 
Savitribai Phule Pune University  
  Oct 2021 - July 2025 
Bachelors of Engineering in Computer Engineering 
          CGPA: 7.6

Lonker Madhyamik Vidyalaya                                                                                                                                                                      April 2019 
Secondary (Class X)                                                                                                                                                                                      Percentage: 80.20 
 
 
PROJECTS 
 
1. Hate Text Detection API | Deep Learning, Fast API, LSTM                                                           Feb 2025 
  
• Built a Hate Text Detection API using FastAPI and LSTM algorithm to analyze text for hate speech or not. 
• Implemented LSTM model to detect and categorize emotional state in the text. 
• Resolved under-fitting by hyper tunning the model and deployed it on Render. 
• Resolved imbalance in that dataset. 
 
2. Construction Delay Predictor | Python, Machine Learning, Pandas                                      Mar 2023 
 
• Developed a machine learning model to predict construction delays during 24-hour hackathon. 
• Conducted data preprocessing and performed feature engineering collaboratively with the team. 
 
 
SKILLS AND INTERESTS 
 
   Programming Languages 
 C++, Python, SQL 
   Libraries /Tools/Algorithm      VS Code, Jupyter Notebook, DSA, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib

• Brain O Vision (Certificate for Python)

• Current Affairs.
